name: Page Teaser Widget
author: Jonas Piela

sections.description:
Add a short teaser text with page thumbnail and link it to a page in your sidebar. The plugin takes care of correct linking. I am using the plugin on my own website.

Check out more details and screenshots here.
sections.installation:
1. Upload page-teaser-widget.php to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Add the widget to your sidebar from Appearance->Widgets and configure the widget options.
sections.faq:
Can multiple instances of the widget be used?

Yes.
